articles.title: People Have No Job: Kareena Kapoor Speaks About Trolls - The Quint
articles.description: Kareena Kapoor Khan talks about maintaining work-life balance and trolls. "I think the pandemic has caused havoc in people's lives and there are too many people without jobs and they don't know what to do," says Kareena.
articles.content: Talking about shooting Laal Singh Chaddha while she was pregnant, Kareena says, "I am always told that I have ants in my pants, but that's not the case. I just love my job a lot and I like being at w… [+238 chars]
